channel.title: Dementhium shops help rep++
channel.description: hey, i went to change a shop and deleted all the rares from it added all the stuff i want saved. when i opened the shop ingame the party hats were there in the shop. then i went back to the shop and the partyhats had appeared again??? :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused:

item.title: Dementhium shops help rep++
item.dc:creator: @owns_reece owns reece
item.description:
@owns_reece wrote:

[quote=“pray4urlife, post:3, topic:439110”][quote author=owns reece link=topic=541810.msg3969191#msg3969191 date=1334009723]
hey, i went to change a shop and deleted all the rares from it added all the stuff i want saved. when i opened the shop ingame the party hats were there in the shop. then i went back to the shop and the partyhats had appeared again???
[/quote]Ok so when you have the shop editor open and you added what you want trying click on another number at the top or any were so it will unselect it then change to a different shop and go back thats what i had to do u need to diselect it after you edit or it will just go back to however the shop was… Try that if it didnt work say something.[/quote]
fixed thanks alot.

Read full topic

item.title: Dementhium shops help rep++
item.dc:creator: @pray4urlife pray4urlife
item.description:
@pray4urlife wrote:

[quote=“owns reece, post:1, topic:439110”]hey, i went to change a shop and deleted all the rares from it added all the stuff i want saved. when i opened the shop ingame the party hats were there in the shop. then i went back to the shop and the partyhats had appeared again??? [/quote]Ok so when you have the shop editor open and you added what you want trying click on another number at the top or any were so it will unselect it then change to a different shop and go back thats what i had to do u need to diselect it after you edit or it will just go back to however the shop was… Try that if it didnt work say something.

Read full topic
